• Browser-based multiplayer mining game with real-time sync via MQTT
  • Procedural terrain generation with resource tiers (dirt, coal, iron, gold, diamond, etc.)
  • Mobile-optimized controls with D-pad and action buttons
  • Upgrade system for drill, hull, fuel, cargo, and special abilities
  • Cloud save system using Puter for cross-device persistence
  • Admin features including player kicking and world management

Mega Miner Online is a collaborative browser mining game where players dig for resources, upgrade equipment, and explore procedurally generated terrain. The game features real-time multiplayer via MQTT, mobile controls, a shop system for upgrades, and cloud saves using Puter for cross-device persistence. Players can build structures, transfer fuel, and manage their inventory while competing on leaderboards.
